page.title: 05St.Ives Golf Course
page.content: This golf course is situated in beautiful surroundings. There is a wood, a lake and moorland very close to the course. It is not a private club but is owned by the Local Authority in Bradford and any member of the public can join it for a small fee. It covers about 4 square miles of land. There are 18 holes and a club house in what used to be an old mansion. This course has been there for 60 years. An international competition has been held here and some famous golfers such as Nick Faldo, Arnold Palmer and Lee Trevino have played at St.Ives. There is a golf shop near the first tee where you can buy any equipment necessary to play the game of golf.
